text: Demise is the second full-length album by Nachtmystium. It is their final album to feature a straightforward black metal sound. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ===Additional personnel=== * Christophe Szpajdel — logo ==References== ==External links== * Nachtmystium Website * Demise on Encyclopaedia Metallum * Nachtmystium Interview Category:Nachtmystium albums Category:2006 albums Category:Southern Lord Records albums
title: Demise (Nachtmystium album)
